mapper.select: SELECT cashier.`paymentType`,cashier.`number`,(select carnumber from carinfo where id=( CASE cashier.`otherone` WHEN 1 THEN repair.`carinfoId` ELSE rescue.`carinfoid` END )) carnumber,cashier.`otherone`, CASE cashier.`otherone` WHEN 1 THEN repair.`orderTime` else rescue.`worktime` end as ordertime, CASE cashier.`otherone` WHEN 1 THEN repair.`nowworkDate` else rescue.`overtime` end as overtime, CASE cashier.`otherone` WHEN 1 THEN repair.`stockDater` else rescue.`stockDater` end as stockdater, CASE cashier.`otherone` WHEN 1 THEN repair.`orderTime` else rescue.`worktime` end as starttime FROM cashier LEFT JOIN repair ON cashier.`Number`= repair.`number` LEFT JOIN rescue ON cashier.`Number` = rescue.`number` where cashier.`cashierstatic`='已支付' and cashier.`clientId`='${clientid}'
mapper.sql: id, totalNum, cashierstatic, paymentType, invoiceNo, cashiertime, staffId, onCredit, interior, clientId, change, Number, otherone, othertwo, otherthree, otherfour, otherfive
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from cashier
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into cashier (id, totalNum, cashierstatic, paymentType, invoiceNo, cashiertime, staffId, onCredit, interior, clientId, change, Number, otherone, othertwo, otherthree, otherfour, otherfive) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalnum,jdbcType=REAL}, #{cashierstatic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paymenttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cashiertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{staffid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oncredit,jdbcType=REAL}, #{interior,jdbcType=REAL}, #{clientid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{change,jdbcType=REAL}, #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otherone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{othertwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otherthree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otherfour,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otherfive,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update cashier

totalNum = #{record.totalnum,jdbcType=REAL},
cashierstatic = #{record.cashierstatic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
paymentType = #{record.paymenttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
